display_long_description:
Face the military in **9 different cities in different modes**.  Don't have a weapon ? No problem at all ! Destroy the building and throw its pieces at the incoming helicopters. Are you low on health ? Eat some locals and you'll immediately feel better. 

[media]

- **9 different cities** to destroy
- Each level can be passed in **4 different modes**
- **4 challenges** available in each level 
- More than **12 different challenges** to complete throughout the game
- **35 achievements** to get !
- **Mixed reality mode**, your room becomes a battlefield !
- New cities coming soon !

[media]
[media]
[media]
